original: @219b ` // gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
analyzed: @219b ` // gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
translated: The Sādhana of the Holder of the Secret Mantra🔽

original: su 'dzin ma ni phyag bzhi pa /
analyzed: su 'dzin ma ni phyag bzhi pa /

original: zhal gcig pa nag po ste /🔽g-yas pa'i phyag dag na rdo rje dang / mchog sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: zhal gcig pa nag po ste / g-yas pa'i phyag dag na rdo rje dang / mchog sbyin pa'o //
translated: She is black, with one face.🔽In her right hands she holds a vajra and a boon-granting hand.

original: g-yon pa'i phyag dag na dgra sta dang zhags pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag dag na dgra sta dang zhags pa'o //
translated: In her left hands she holds a battle-axe and a noose.

original: h'um gi sa bon can no //
analyzed: h'um gi sa bon can no //
translated: She has the seed syllable hūṃ.

original: mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can zla ba'i 'od dang zla ba'i gdan can sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can zla ba'i 'od dang zla ba'i gdan can sngar bzhin no //
translated: She has Akṣobhya as the crest jewel, the light of the moon, and a moon seat, as before.

original: 'phags pa gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'phags pa gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of the noble Mahāvidyādhārī is complete.
